name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Law Seva CA Cloud Desk Utility

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Law Seva CA Cloud Desk Utility

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Law Seva CA Cloud Desk Utility helps you to easily maintain your ITR/GST passwords and Open Local File Paths.

Benefits

This extension will allow you to manage your GST/ITR passwords in a hassle free manner.
This extension can be used to open any type of local file, such as PDFs, Word documents, image files, and more.
The extension is very easy to use. Simply click on the extension icon in the toolbar and proceed.
The extension is safe and secure. The user must explicitly grant the extension permission to access local files. Additionally, the script that is injected into the page is sandboxed, which means that it cannot access other websites or files on the user's computer.
How to use

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon in the toolbar.
Select the file that you want to open.
The file will open in a new tab in Chrome.
Features

Open any type of local file.
Easy to use.
Safe and secure.
Why use this extension?

This extension is a simple and useful tool for opening local file paths in Chrome.
It is easy to use and does not collect any personal information.
It is safe and secure, thanks to the sandboxed script that is injected into the page.
